title: How to Check Your Glo Night Plan Data Balance: 5 Ways

steps.title: Open your messaging app and compose a text to 127.
steps.content: Open your messaging app and compose a text to 127. In the body of the text, type in INFO, then hit Send . You should get a text back displaying your data usage. [2] X Research source

steps.title: This is one of the quickest ways to check your balance.
steps.content: This is one of the quickest ways to check your balance. Open up your phone’s dialer and punch in *127*0#. You should automatically get a text displaying your current data balance with Glo. [3] X Research source

steps.title: This is the general number to access your Glo account.
steps.content: This is the general number to access your Glo account. After you dial, enter a series of numbers using the automated menu. You’ll get a text to your phone displaying your current data usage. To do this: [4] X Research source Dial *777# on your phone. Dial 1 to select the buy data option. Next, dial 4 for manage plan . Dial 4 again to select get data balance .

steps.title: You can also view your data balance in your browser.
steps.content: You can also view your data balance in your browser. Open a browser on your phone or computer and go to the Glo website while you are logged into the Glo network. This page will display a portal where you can access information about your plan, including your current data usage. [5] X Research source

steps.title: Download the app from the App Store or Google Play.
steps.content: Download the app from the App Store or Google Play. Glo Café allows you to purchase and manage data plans directly from the app. Once you download the app, follow the prompts to set up an account or log into an account that already exists. Once you log in, you’ll be able to see your current data usage on the main app screen. [6] X Research source
